code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import session from"./session";import usersReducer from"./user";import musician from"./musician";import song from"./song";import comment from'./comment';const rootReducer=combineReducers({session,musician,usersReducer:usersReducer,song,comment});let enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="production"){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{const logger=require("redux-logger").default;const composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}const configureStore=preloadedState=>{return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
